ability.Mystic Eyes: This Pokemon cannot have its stats lowered.
ability.Focused Destruction: Once per turn, this Pokemon can randomly lower one of the opponent's stats by one stage.

Legend Strike.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Mind Shatter.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Recover.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.

Psychic Blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
